{{Infobox Berry |name = #47 Charti |image = [[File:Charti.png]] |caption = It is often used for pickles because of its very dry flavor. It can also be eaten raw for its provocative taste. This Berry plant hardens the surrounding soil, decreasing the chances of replanting. |growtime = 10h 30m 0s |harvest = 32 berries |replant = 5% |mutation = 0.01% |points = 2,000 |flavor =
